documentation.text:
@title Showtime V1 Market for the Showtime ERC1155 Token
 This is a non-escrow marketplace that allows users to list Showtime NFTs for sale
 for a fixed price, using a configurable list of allowed ERC20 currencies.
 @dev listings have no expiration date, but frontends may choose to hide old listings
 Built with feedback from the community! ♥️
 Big thanks to:
     aaronsebesta chejazi chiuzon garythung mariobyn_eth MarkBeylin sina_eth_
     StErMi theramblingboy timidan_x transmissions11 William94029369
the address of the ShowtimeMT NFT (ERC1155) contract
royalties payments can be turned on/off by the owner of the contract
the configurable cap on royalties, enforced during the sale (50% by default)
the configurable list of accepted ERC20 contract addresses
maps a listing id to the corresponding Listing
a simple counter to assign ids to new listings
marketplace and listing related events
admin events

statements.documentation: initialize the address of the NFT contract
set the trustedForwarder only once, see BaseRelayRecipient

devdoc.details: listings have no expiration date, but frontends may choose to hide old listings Built with feedback from the community! ♥️ Big thanks to:     aaronsebesta chejazi chiuzon garythung mariobyn_eth MarkBeylin sina_eth_     StErMi theramblingboy timidan_x transmissions11 William94029369

buy(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,addr.details: we let the transaction complete even if the currency is no longer accepted in order to avoid stuck listings

params._quantity: the number of tokens to purchase
params._receiver: the address that will receive the NFTs

params._quantity: the number of tokens to be listed

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Showtime V1 Market for the Showtime ERC1155 Token This is a non-escrow marketplace that allows users to list Showtime NFTs for sale for a fixed price, using a configurable list of allowed ERC20 currencies.

acceptedCurrencies(address).notice: the configurable list of accepted ERC20 contract addresses

availableForSale(uint256).notice: the seller may own fewer NFTs than the listed quantity

listings(uint256).notice: maps a listing id to the corresponding Listing

maxRoyaltiesBasisPoints().notice: the configurable cap on royalties, enforced during the sale (50% by default)

nft().notice: the address of the ShowtimeMT NFT (ERC1155) contract

royaltiesEnabled().notice: royalties payments can be turned on/off by the owner of the contract

setAcceptedCurrency(address,bool).notice: add a currency to the accepted currency list

setMaxRoyalties(uint256).notice: sets the maximum royalties that will be paid during sales, in basis points ex: if a token requests 75% royalties but maxRoyaltiesBasisPoints is set to 60_00 (= 60%),    then 60% will be paid out instead of the 75% requested
